title: Dominate Person
content:
18mWIS Save Concentration

Dominate Person is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Dominate Person is a Lvl 5 Spell from the Enchantment school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Dominate Person Information

Description: Make a humanoid fight alongside you. Every time the creature takes damage, it makes a Wisdom Saving Throw against your domination. Allies cannot be dominated. Level: Lvl 5 spell School: Enchantmen
